author: remm
msg: - Add support for override flag in ContextConfig: none of the default context files will be parsed. This flag will only be used if the context
has a config file with override="true" in conf/engine/host, because the one in /META-INF/context.xml will be parsed later on.
- Add the default context files to the monitor list for all contexts.

author: remm
msg: - Rewrite the manager for the new deployer.
- I only tested the basic stuff, using the HTML manager, so there will likely be issues.

author: remm
msg: - Modify HostConfig for use in the manager servlet, as planned.
- Add JMX registration for this component.
- Still some tweak are needed for handling undeploying (one quick example which causes problems right now is
trying to undeploy the admin webapp).

author: billbarker
msg: Update the StandardContext MBean to match StandardContext.
-- Remove the dynamic resource methods that are no longer in StandardContext.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 12056. Test for execute rather than read permissions since execute is what we need.
Add missing JDK not JRE warning.
